title: Consider the Role of Sales
text: When you think about a colleague in sales, what are their primary responsibilities and how can they assist with your initiative?

title: Understanding Clarification
text: Clarifying the need means providing more information to ensure that there is a clear understanding of what is required. In this context, why might it be important to clarify the needs of your initiative to a sales colleague?

title: Defining Your Requirements
text: Think about what specifics you need from your colleague in sales. How can defining exactly what you need help streamline the process of working together?
